column7: ['• Business trip', '• Group', '• Lower Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 1 night']
column8: The rooms were really little and a bit damp. Almost no space for suitcases. The aircon was in front of one bed so it was either be cold or hot.
column9: Staff reall nice and helpful. Rooms clean enough and well situated.

column6: “Cockroaches, flies, mosquitoes, bugs and ants all around the...”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• People with friends', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8:
Cockroaches, flies, mosquitoes, bugs and ants all around the place, including inside of our locker. We were too disgusted to sit on a bed and chairs, and even to use the bathrooms as toilets were indescribably filthy and seemed to not been cleaned for a very long time. 
What my female companion reported to me, is that female bathroom has a 5-6 inch gap at the bottom of the door meaning anyone could kneel down and overlook a woman showering / using the toilet.

column6: “Great location cuz you've got 3 MRT station nearby,...”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Couple', '• Deluxe Double Room', '• Stayed 3 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Just a bit noisy in the morning and in the afternoon cuz there is the backpacker's kitchen just near your room
column9: Great location cuz you've got 3 MRT station nearby, going to downtown and everywhere. And little India is such a safe and nice part of Singapore. And thank you very much to the guy at the office and the young housekeeper who always want to be sure everything is ok and you feel good and very helpful. So thanks for that 😉 Will come back here next time

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Lower Bed in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 2 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8:
They don't change bed sheets, don't know for how many days. AC was not working properly and when complained about this they said we fix it in evening
Room not clean
column9: Location was quite okay. Easily accessible. In little india. Metro is also just maybe 300 metre.

column6: “This is the only available 4 bed dorm in that area.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Lower Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 7 nights']
column8:
The guests stayed with me(almost everyone - regular customers) did not silence their mobile and talk all the day/night with loud voice. 
Some guests who were allocated upper bed would occupy the lower bed if the person is not around.
Near by night club sound will end by only at 2 AM.
There are cockroaches.
The floor is not cleaned under the cot.
The shower is loose and it will disconnect always ( May be no one has reported)
A/C did not work on the first day, informed the in charge, he came and checked and said it is working. I informed this to one regular guest, he removed the air filter & kept aside and the A/C started cooling the room. The filter was cleaned & fixed by the staff next day and there was no issue afterwards.
Bathroom door is a joke, broken and no locks.- No exhaust in bathroom/toilet.
column9: This is the only available 4 bed dorm in that area.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Couple', '• 2 Beds in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8:
Only one bathroom with shower and toilet on the same place. Don't be to hurry to pee if someone is taking is shower or washing her clothes. 
Bunk and mattress was really rustic. My boyfriend had some springs against is back all night long. 
One night was enough.
column9: The staff really nice and friendly. Good location too.

column6: “Seems its a place for migrant workers to live. you're better off paying a little extra elsewhere.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 4 nights']
column8:
1. The smell was awful, 
2. cockroaches were running all over including on the bed as you sleep 
3. Great risk of catching some illness using the bathroom etc. 
4. owner doesn't recall care to improve the facility,
column9:
There was nothing to like 
Probably the breakfast was ok.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Lower Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 2 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Bathroom door ( lock not worked) it's 4 bunker bed room so bathroom door lock should be locked for privacy.
column9: Nice near MRT ,7 eleven , little india restaurants.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Family with young children', '• Deluxe Double Room', '• Stayed 2 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: We were made to wait for two hours past the checkin time which was 2pm, we werent informed that the previous occupant hasnt checked out when we enquired at 12pm.And the manager was rude telling that, room is not ready, you wait or go out and come back.He wasnt ready to listen that we need room to freshen up.This was the only worst customer experience we had in singapore
column9: Bed

column6: “Worst backpacker I have ever stayed in. Avoid this place.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Lower Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 2 nights']
column8:
The bathroom was horrible. There was no soap in the toilets, they were dirty and smelly all the time except when it was cleaned in the morning. The toilets are absolutely horrible.
The rooms were also dusty and you can see small cockroaches. The air conditioner did not work in the room as well.
column9: Location was in a central area, near train stations and many decent restaurants near by.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Family with young children', '• Deluxe Double Room', '• Stayed 3 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: The room was very small ( exactly opposite to what is mentioned on the website )with basic facilities not luxury. Wifi was poor and had issues while using inside room. The room wasn’t cleaned during the entire stay. Kitchen is next to the room and made in an open passage leads to the room. The breakfast is pathetic ( 4 bread slices with butter/jam , one egg and coffee is all that you get everyday ) and you need to cross the road and go in another building for that. The lane is full of dance bars which make loud nice till late night. The refrigerator wasn’t functioning and had an unpleasant smell inside it.
column9: Proximity to downtoline line MRT stations.

column6: “It was full of bugs, even inside the lockers.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• Upper Bed in 8-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 4 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: It was full of bugs, even inside the lockers. There is only one bathroom for women (one toilet and one shower), and there’s no window in the bedroom. The common area was small and doesn’t have air conditioned. I expected much more, and I think it was too expensive for its value

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 3 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Everything. It is the worst. GO SOMEWHERE ELSE PLEASE.
column9:
Worst hostel, infested.with bed bugs and no matters are taken to end this at all.
Until 4AM loud music from a caraoce bar each night, it,s a very very filthy place, please, for you own wellbeing book another hostel...

column6: “Owner asked me to move to another place for last 2 days...”
column7: ['• Business trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Lower Bed in 4-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 7 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Owner asked me to move to another place for last 2 days despite my booking at the place.. Very unprofessional.. I wont recommend anybody to go to this place... I am also not sure to trust booking.com hotels anymore

column6: “Free breakfast is a bit of a lie. Staff non-existent. Otherwise, ok.”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 2 nights']
column8:
The way that this hostel is run and staffed is ridiculous. Checking in and even checking out is not easy because staff members are basically never present and you have to hunt around for them to track them down. This is not acceptable for an establishment that deals with customers. For me, checking in was a nightmare and I had to wait around on the street for a good 30 minutes before being able to get inside. You cannot check in after midnight apparently, although this information is not adequately shared upon booking.
Breakfast is also a lie. I stayed here two nights and there was no "free breakfast" on either day. That's because to get breakfast, you have to 'talk to a member of staff', and there are no staff members to talk to. I believe that the hostel does this on purpose to avoid having to give any breakfast to guests - but it is wrong. Either this staffing issue needs to be sorted out, or the information should be removed from Booking.com's listing. Other guests were waiting around for breakfast and asking me where it was. Just go down to Bencoolen street and get yourself some kaya toast for a few dollars. Less hassle.
column9: It's a hostel. Just a hostel. A basic hostel. There is a bed and a bathroom. That is it. The bed is comfortable enough and the room is kept at a comfortable temperature. Also, each guest is supplied with a locker, though you need to pay a deposit of S$10 (or an alternative in another currency). The other good thing is the location. It is in the heart of Little India with two of three MRT stations, shops, restaurants and food courts in close proximity.

column6: “Worst night in a "hostel" in my life. Should be taken out of business and booking.com immediately!”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• 2 rooms', '• Stayed 2 nights']
column8:
1. For the first night we got placed on a completely different room than we booked, because "booking.com messed up the reservation" and just had one room instead of two rooms.
2. In the new room, which was a "family" room with 4 bunk beds, cockroaches and bed bugs felt like home. When we approached the staff with the problem, they seemed to be fully aware of the situation already and just sprayed around some disgusting insect-spray. The smell in this hostel was terrible in any room, anyways. After this incident, two of us moved in a new hostel, which was way better for the same money.
3. In the new double-bed room on the second night the bathroom was full of insects and we even had the pleasure to spend the night with a mouse under our bed. We saw it already in the evening and told the staff, which said they had no mouses at all. After asking about the rat or mouse trap, which was in the hallway just next to the "lobby" (!), they said they will send someone. Also, they offered that we could put bleach on our bags by ourselves to keep the mouse out of it, which we did not do of course. No one ever came, and we had to spend the worst night of our trip in this room.
column9: Nothing good about this sinkhole. Wondering, that this place is still allowed to stay in business. We were just sorry about the staff, which seemed to be treated very badly and had to work long shifts on several days without any sleep.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• People with friends', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: Booked the dorm to sleep for couple of hours, but ac wasn’t working, people in the dorm were playing music on phone, doing video calling without using headphones, even upon repeated request no one was ready to listen. Rules should be set in place for usage of dormitories.
column9: Only the front desk/ office people are nice and humble, but their property is in pity state.

column7: ['• Business trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: It was messy, smell everywhere, washrooms were ugly even muslim shower was without shower part, only pipe part was available. Cockroaches were added benefit :-) ... AC starts from 4:00 PM and before that we have to depend upon two fans in the whole hall, they can make single bed space pods or cabins with its attached bath.
column9: Cost

column6: “Great location for exploring Little India and being only  a...”
column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Couple', '• Deluxe Double Room', '• Stayed 2 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: The room was really noisy at night. Breakfast option was not very nice.
column9: Great location for exploring Little India and being only  a block away from Rochor station on the Downtown line is ideal.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Solo traveller', '• Lower Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 1 night', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8:
How is this still listed on booking.com?  Seems like an underground hostel where local or temporary workers stay for a long time and that is probably why they dont bother keeping it to a minimum standard. I found bugs in my locker where they keep the pillow and sheets until your arrival. I slept without both. 
I saw 3 different type of bugs during my 1 nigth stay( 2 cocrroach and 1 flea/bed bug type). 
I traveled many hostels in thailand for way cheaper but i guess it s a different story in singapore or just for this one. 
It is maybe my fault that i did not read the reviews and even after i found that the negative were true and it migth be worse. 
Negative experience. 
I was surely not gonna eat no breakfast here, even if it is served accross the street.
column9: The guy at the front is friendly. The location is close to public transit.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• Group', '• Deluxe Family Room', '• Stayed 5 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: The rooms smell strongly of mould. We got a room in the ground floor, and were able to change to a less smelly one on the first floor. The accommodation has a serious problem with cleanliness. The bathroom is dirty and there are insects coming out of the drain. We arrived and there was nobody to check us in. Even though they were informed of the arrival time, we were unpolitely told that we should have arrived early. I would not reccommend this property.
column9: Nice location and comfortable beds.

column7: ['• Leisure trip', '• People with friends', '• Upper Bed in 18-Bed Mixed Dormitory Room', '• Stayed 3 nights', '• Submitted via mobile']
column8: I with my friends stay 4N3D at this hostel. 1st night is our nightmare because the bedbugs attack us. However, the staff change all of us to another room which is more nice room for us 4person without add extra penny.
column9: All the staff very friendly and clean our bed everyday.
